org.grouplens.lenskit.eval.script

Class GroovyActionTask<K>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.common.util.concurrent.AbstractFuture<T>
      • org.grouplens.lenskit.eval.AbstractTask<K>
        • org.grouplens.lenskit.eval.script.GroovyActionTask<K>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ListenableFuture<K>, java.util.concurrent.Future<K>, EvalTask<K>

    public class GroovyActionTask<K>
extends AbstractTask<K>
    A basic Eval task that executes a Groovy action. These tasks are added by TargetDelegate.perform(Closure).
    Since:
    1.2
